00080 static PointerRNA rna_ParticleEdit_brush_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00081 {
00082     ParticleEditSettings *pset = (ParticleEditSettings*)ptr->data;
00083     ParticleBrushData *brush = NULL;
00084 
00085     if (pset->brushtype != PE_BRUSH_NONE)
00086         brush = &pset->brush[pset->brushtype];
00087 
00088     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_ParticleBrush, brush);
00089 }
00090 
00091 static PointerRNA rna_ParticleBrush_curve_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00092 {
00093     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_CurveMapping, NULL);
00094 }
00095 
00096 static void rna_ParticleEdit_redo(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *scene, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr))
00097 {
00098     Object *ob = (scene->basact)? scene->basact->object: NULL;
00099     PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(scene, ob);
00100 
00101     if (!edit)
00102         return;
00103 
00104     psys_free_path_cache(edit->psys, edit);
00105 }
00106 
00107 static void rna_ParticleEdit_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *scene, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr))
00108 {
00109     Object *ob = (scene->basact)? scene->basact->object: NULL;
00110 
00111     if (ob) DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00112 }
00113 static void rna_ParticleEdit_tool_set(PointerRNA *ptr, int value)
00114 {
00115     ParticleEditSettings *pset = (ParticleEditSettings*)ptr->data;
00116     
00117     /* redraw hair completely if weight brush is/was used */
00118     if ((pset->brushtype == PE_BRUSH_WEIGHT || value == PE_BRUSH_WEIGHT) && pset->scene) {
00119         Object *ob = (pset->scene->basact)? pset->scene->basact->object: NULL;
00120         if (ob) {
00121             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00122             WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_PARTICLE|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     pset->brushtype = value;
00127 }
00128 static EnumPropertyItem *rna_ParticleEdit_tool_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr),
00129                                                      PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *UNUSED(free))
00130 {
00131     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00132     Object *ob = (scene->basact)? scene->basact->object: NULL;
00133 #if 0
00134     PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(scene, ob);
00135     ParticleSystem *psys = edit ? edit->psys : NULL;
00136 #else
00137     /* use this rather than PE_get_current() - because the editing cache is
00138      * dependent on the cache being updated which can happen after this UI
00139      * draws causing a glitch [#28883] */
00140     ParticleSystem *psys = psys_get_current(ob);
00141 #endif
00142 
00143     if (psys) {
00144         if (psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR) {
00145             return particle_edit_disconnected_hair_brush_items;
00146         }
00147         else {
00148             return particle_edit_hair_brush_items;
00149         }
00150     }
00151 
00152     return particle_edit_cache_brush_items;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static int rna_ParticleEdit_editable_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00156 {
00157     ParticleEditSettings *pset = (ParticleEditSettings*)ptr->data;
00158 
00159     return (pset->object && pset->scene && PE_get_current(pset->scene, pset->object));
00160 }
00161 static int rna_ParticleEdit_hair_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00162 {
00163     ParticleEditSettings *pset = (ParticleEditSettings*)ptr->data;
00164 
00165     if (pset->scene) {
00166         PTCacheEdit *edit = PE_get_current(pset->scene, pset->object);
00167 
00168         return (edit && edit->psys);
00169     }
00170     
00171     return 0;
00172 }
00173 
00174 static int rna_Brush_mode_poll(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00175 {
00176     Scene *scene = (Scene *)ptr->id.data;
00177     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00178     Brush *brush = value.id.data;
00179     int mode = 0;
00180 
00181     /* check the origin of the Paint struct to see which paint
00182      * mode to select from */
00183 
00184     if (ptr->data == &ts->imapaint)
00185         mode = OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT;
00186     else if (ptr->data == ts->sculpt)
00187         mode = OB_MODE_SCULPT;
00188     else if (ptr->data == ts->vpaint)
00189         mode = OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT;
00190     else if (ptr->data == ts->wpaint)
00191         mode = OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT;
00192 
00193     return brush->ob_mode & mode;
00194 }
00195 
00196 static void rna_Sculpt_update(Main *UNUSED(bmain), Scene *scene, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr))
00197 {
00198     Object *ob = (scene->basact)? scene->basact->object: NULL;
00199 
00200     if (ob) {
00201         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00202         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 #else

00208 static void rna_def_paint(BlenderRNA *brna)
00209 {
00210     StructRNA *srna;
00211     PropertyRNA *prop;
00212 
00213     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Paint", NULL);
00214     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Paint", "");
00215 
00216     /* Global Settings */
00217     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "brush", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
00218     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
00219     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, NULL, "rna_Brush_mode_poll");
00220     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Brush", "Active Brush");
00221     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_BRUSH|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00222 
00223     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_brush", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00224     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", PAINT_SHOW_BRUSH);
00225     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Show Brush", "");
00226 
00227     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_brush_on_surface", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00228     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", PAINT_SHOW_BRUSH_ON_SURFACE);
00229     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Show Brush On Surface", "");
00230 
00231     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_low_resolution", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00232     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", PAINT_FAST_NAVIGATE);
00233     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Fast Navigate", "For multires, show low resolution while navigating the view");
00234 }

00236 static void rna_def_sculpt(BlenderRNA  *brna)
00237 {
00238     StructRNA *srna;
00239     PropertyRNA *prop;
00240 
00241     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Sculpt", "Paint");
00242     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Sculpt", "");
00243 
00244     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "radial_symmetry", PROP_INT, PROP_XYZ);
00245     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "radial_symm");
00246     RNA_def_property_int_default(prop, 1);
00247     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, 64);
00248     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 32, 1, 1);
00249     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Radial Symmetry Count X Axis",
00250                              "Number of times to copy strokes across the surface");
00251 
00252     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_symmetry_x", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00253     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_SYMM_X);
00254     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Symmetry X", "Mirror brush across the X axis");
00255 
00256     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_symmetry_y", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00257     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_SYMM_Y);
00258     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Symmetry Y", "Mirror brush across the Y axis");
00259 
00260     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_symmetry_z", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00261     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_SYMM_Z);
00262     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Symmetry Z", "Mirror brush across the Z axis");
00263 
00264     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "lock_x", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00265     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_LOCK_X);
00266     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Lock X", "Disallow changes to the X axis of vertices");
00267 
00268     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "lock_y", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00269     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_LOCK_Y);
00270     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Lock Y", "Disallow changes to the Y axis of vertices");
00271 
00272     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "lock_z", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00273     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_LOCK_Z);
00274     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Lock Z", "Disallow changes to the Z axis of vertices");
00275 
00276     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_symmetry_feather", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00277     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_SYMMETRY_FEATHER);
00278     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Symmetry Feathering",
00279                              "Reduce the strength of the brush where it overlaps symmetrical daubs");
00280 
00281     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_threaded", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00282     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_USE_OPENMP);
00283     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use OpenMP",
00284                              "Take advantage of multiple CPU cores to improve sculpting performance");
00285 
00286     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_deform_only", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00287     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flags", SCULPT_ONLY_DEFORM);
00288     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use Deform Only",
00289                              "Use only deformation modifiers (temporary disable all "
00290                              "constructive modifiers except multi-resolution)");
00291     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, "rna_Sculpt_update");
00292 }

00306 {

00309 
00310     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "VertexPaint", "Paint");
00311     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "VPaint");

00313 
00314     /* vertex paint only */

00316     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", VP_AREA);
00317     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "All Faces", "Paint on all faces inside brush");
00318 
00319     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_normal", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00320     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", VP_NORMALS);
00321     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Normals", "Apply the vertex normal before painting");
00322     
00323     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_spray", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00324     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", VP_SPRAY);
00325     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Spray", "Keep applying paint effect while holding mouse");
00326 
00327     /* weight paint only */
00328     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_group_restrict", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00329     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", VP_ONLYVGROUP);
00330     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Restrict", "Restrict painting to verts already apart of the vertex group");
00331 }

00333 static void rna_def_image_paint(BlenderRNA *brna)
00334 {
00335     StructRNA *srna;
00336     PropertyRNA *prop;
00337     
00338     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ImagePaint", "Paint");
00339     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "ImagePaintSettings");
00340     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Image Paint", "Properties of image and texture painting mode");
00341     
00342     /* booleans */
00343     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_projection", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00344     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_DISABLE);
00345     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Project Paint",
00346                              "Use projection painting for improved consistency in the brush strokes");
00347     
00348     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_occlude", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00349     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_XRAY);
00350     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Occlude", "Only paint onto the faces directly under the brush (slower)");
00351     
00352     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_backface_culling", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00353     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_BACKFACE);
00354     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Cull", "Ignore faces pointing away from the view (faster)");
00355     
00356     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_normal_falloff", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00357     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_FLAT);
00358     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Normal", "Paint most on faces pointing towards the view");
00359     
00360     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_stencil_layer", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00361     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_LAYER_STENCIL);
00362     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Stencil Layer", "Set the mask layer from the UV map buttons");
00363     
00364     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "invert_stencil", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00365     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_LAYER_STENCIL_INV);
00366     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Invert", "Invert the stencil layer");
00367     
00368     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_clone_layer", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00369     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", IMAGEPAINT_PROJECT_LAYER_CLONE);
00370     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Clone Map",
00371                              "Use another UV map as clone source, otherwise use the 3D cursor as the source");
00372     
00373     /* integers */
00374     
00375     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "seam_bleed", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00376     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 8, 0, 0);
00377     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bleed", "Extend paint beyond the faces UVs to reduce seams (in pixels, slower)");
00378 
00379     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "normal_angle", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00380     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 90);
00381     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Angle", "Paint most on faces pointing towards the view according to this angle");
00382 
00383     prop = RNA_def_int_array(srna, "screen_grab_size", 2, NULL, 0, 0, "screen_grab_size",
00384                             "Size to capture the image for re-projecting", 0, 0);
00385     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 512, 16384);
00386 }

00388 static void rna_def_particle_edit(BlenderRNA *brna)
00389 {
00390     StructRNA *srna;
00391     PropertyRNA *prop;
00392 
00393     static EnumPropertyItem select_mode_items[] = {
00394         {SCE_SELECT_PATH, "PATH", ICON_PARTICLE_PATH, "Path", "Path edit mode"},
00395         {SCE_SELECT_POINT, "POINT", ICON_PARTICLE_POINT, "Point", "Point select mode"},
00396         {SCE_SELECT_END, "TIP", ICON_PARTICLE_TIP, "Tip", "Tip select mode"},
00397         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00398 
00399     static EnumPropertyItem puff_mode[] = {
00400         {0, "ADD", 0, "Add", "Make hairs more puffy"},
00401         {1, "SUB", 0, "Sub", "Make hairs less puffy"},
00402         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00403 
00404     static EnumPropertyItem length_mode[] = {
00405         {0, "GROW", 0, "Grow", "Make hairs longer"},
00406         {1, "SHRINK", 0, "Shrink", "Make hairs shorter"},
00407         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00408 
00409     static EnumPropertyItem edit_type_items[] = {
00410         {PE_TYPE_PARTICLES, "PARTICLES", 0, "Particles", ""},
00411         {PE_TYPE_SOFTBODY, "SOFT_BODY", 0, "Soft body", ""},
00412         {PE_TYPE_CLOTH, "CLOTH", 0, "Cloth", ""},
00413         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00414     };
00415 
00416 
00417     /* edit */
00418 
00419     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "ParticleEdit", NULL);
00420     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "ParticleEditSettings");
00421     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Particle Edit", "Properties of particle editing mode");
00422 
00423     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tool", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00424     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "brushtype");
00425     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, particle_edit_hair_brush_items);
00426     RNA_def_property_enum_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_ParticleEdit_tool_set", "rna_ParticleEdit_tool_itemf");
00427     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tool", "");
00428 
00429     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select_mode", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00430     RNA_def_property_enum_bitflag_sdna(prop, NULL, "selectmode");
00431     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, select_mode_items);
00432     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Selection Mode", "Particle select and display mode");
00433     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, "rna_ParticleEdit_update");
00434 
00435     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_preserve_length", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00436     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", PE_KEEP_LENGTHS);
00437     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Keep Lengths", "Keep path lengths constant");
00438 
00439     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_preserve_root", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00440     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", PE_LOCK_FIRST);
00441     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Keep Root", "Keep root keys unmodified");
00442 
00443     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_emitter_deflect", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00444     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", PE_DEFLECT_EMITTER);
00445     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Deflect Emitter", "Keep paths from intersecting the emitter");
00446 
00447     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "emitter_distance", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
00448     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "emitterdist");
00449     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0.0f, 10.0f, 10, 3);
00450     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Emitter Distance", "Distance to keep particles away from the emitter");
00451 
00452     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_fade_time", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00453     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", PE_FADE_TIME);
00454     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Fade Time", "Fade paths and keys further away from current frame");

00560 void RNA_def_sculpt_paint(BlenderRNA *brna)
